entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
